      protected Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity)
      calculate the specular color of specific light source
      Parameters:
      ks - specular factor
      l - vector from the light source to the intersection
      n - normal to the intersection
      v - vector from the camera to the intersection
      nShininess - Shininess factor
      lightIntensity - the light color
      Returns:
      the specular color
